content: Aug 7 U.S. financial technology provider Fiserv made an improved offer for Monitise worth about 75 million pounds ($98 million) on Monday  hoping to secure backing from the British financial services technology group's investors.

title: UPDATE 1-Fintech firm Fiserv raises offer for Monitise to $98 mln

content: Aug 7 Monitise has offered its backing for a takeover of the British financial services technology company by Fiserv after the U.S. financial technology provider made an improved offer that values the firm at about 75 million pounds.
name: Fiserv Inc
title: Fiserv secures takeover OK from UK's Monitise with improved offer

content: LONDON  June 15 Top Monitise shareholder Cavendish Asset Management said on Thursday an offer from U.S. rival Fiserv for the British financial services technology firm was too low  and it would vote against the deal.

title: Top Monitise investor Cavendish says to vote against Fiserv deal
